name: Lead Magnet Kit (Notion + Canva)
description: Attract and grow your email list with ease by creating your own lead magnet. This Notion Lead Magnet Kit is designed to help. This template is a step-by-step guide broken down into [5] sections:PlanningCreating Your ContentDesigning Your FreebieDelivery and FulmentTracking Performance (Scorecard set up and included)I've also included a Canva design template to make designing your lead magnet super simple!
features: Creating Your Content; Designing Your Freebie; Delivery and Fulment; Tracking Performance (Scorecard set up and  included)
